name: Dream Circus
overview: The dream circus is a 2d graphics cartoon game in which the player controls all the things related to a circus, but in the future: He can select the zone to install the circus, choose the employees, buy new things and try to earn money to improve the Circus. The game is divided into 6 different islands where they will perform and can buy new things. The main goal of the game is to be the Number 1 Circus in the planet. The game features different ways to train your employees and make them perform better in the circus, they can practice the moves at any time and after a few time there will be Circus competitions against other rival Circus. In the mini games the player controls the character and the better perform is gain by the number of applauses that the characters got for their performances. There are also different mini games to play and the game features a 2 player vs mode.
